title: malicious macros
extract: The macro virus replaces regular commands with the same name and runs when the command is selected. These malicious macros may start automatically when a document is opened or closed, without the user's knowledge. Once a file containing a macro virus is opened, the virus can infect the system.
extract_html: The macro virus replaces regular commands with the same name and runs when the command is selected. These malicious macros may start automatically when a document is opened or closed, without the user's knowledge. Once a file containing a macro virus is opened, the virus can infect the system.
